conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a action movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.text: Of course! Based on your interest in action movies, I highly recommend "John Wick" and "Mad Max: Fury Road". I hope you enjoy them!

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
Ah, great choice! If you enjoyed the action-packed excitement of Mad Max: Fury Road, here are two recommendations that might interest you:

* John Wick (2014) - This stylish and thrilling movie follows a retired hitman who must fight his way through a maze of assassins after a group of thugs kill his dog. Keanu Reeves shines in the lead role, delivering a memorable performance.
* Die Hard (1988) - This classic action movie stars Bruce Willis as John McClane, a detective who must stop a group of terrorists from robbing a high-rise office building in Los Angeles. With plenty of explosions, gunfights, and witty one-liners, Die Hard is an adrenaline-fueled thrill ride.
